name: (SAE Project) Blue Shift
description:
Blue Shift is a puzzle game with slight platformer aspects. The inspiration for blue shift came from the unique controls that could only be achieved by mobile devices, the gyroscope. By turning the mobile device the player can change the gravity of the character in the game to avoid traps and advance to the next level. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Developed By:

Dickson Hee

Jason McKay

Rowan Koch
